in this post, i'm using a critical tone to express my skepticism towards the idea of protecting personal information in the digital age. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), i'm indicating that i don't believe it's possible to maintain privacy in today's society, especially with the prevalence of surveillance capitalism. the phrase "nein zu surveillance capitalism" (no to surveillance capitalism) further emphasizes my stance against the exploitation of personal data for profit.
